text:
The two things we need to have are:
• What we did today with the Sambica camp. We had a forward, a couple questions and that was it. If you think I will abuse it, look at what we did
today. It was not even allowed and I did not abuse it. Please allow that just like we effectively used today.
• A better way to accommodate urgent situations. I had no idea where the tryouts were. I sent you an OFW and said it was urgent. You still did not
check until well after I would have needed to leave. I don’t want to get AD involved in that. We should not. But only the email solved it. Again, not
allowed.
Both are perfect examples of what we need. And we did both today with great success. So we have a proven track record. After a month of this and a
full day tomorrow before you have to rinse and repeat next week, may we please allow what we are already doing? It wasn’t and won’t be abused.
I apologize again for the frustration. It arises from our inability to communicate. If we could just start that again with this baby step, it will go a long
way.
Please just call for five minutes on platform if you would like to discuss. Let’s team up here!
Message 1750 of 4024
Any thoughts?
Can we please wrap before you move on to other things again?

Subject:Re: Can we close?

I feel uncomfortable because boundaries are blurred with those conditions.
The safeguards are in place and I know my mental state has vastly improved as a result.
I am feeling pressured right now and need to step away.
